headline: Pomerantz Law Firm Investigates Claims On Behalf of Investors of T-Mobile US, Inc. - TMUS
summary: NEW YORK, June 7, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Pomerantz LLP is investigating claims on behalf of investors of T-Mobile US, Inc.  . Such investors are advised to contact Danielle Peyton at...

headline: T-Mobile US: Growth Surpasses Expectations, Valuation Limits Upside
summary: T-Mobile US offers solid growth ahead of consensus, but high capex and tariff risks limit upside. Find out why TMUS stock is a hold.
